QuestData.Title: Ending Executions
QuestData.Description: We arrived as soon as we could... but we are too late. Nethergarde has fallen. The Iron Horde has taken a number of Nethergarde warriors prisoner.$b$bNo doubt they are trying to squeeze vital information out of our troops.$b$bI fear once they are done with their interrogation they will not hesitate to execute their prisoners. Time is running out.
QuestData.RewardText: The prisoners are shaken up, but they are free. Their families are in your debt, $n.
